description: This is the main source file ('main.dart') for a Flutter application. It contains the entry point, main widget, and the home page which displays a loading message for a Tic Tac Toe frontend.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: The main application widget that sets up the overall theme and routing of the app.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the home page with a title and loading message.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: The state class for MyHomePage, building the UI with a Scaffold containing an AppBar and loading message.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The entry point of the application that runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Method of the MyApp and _MyHomePageState classes that builds the widget tree.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the MyHomePage widget.
